page.title: 07Gayton Conservation Area
page.content: The Gayton Conservation Area **************************** The{Old Gayton Village }was designated a{Conservation Area}on{27th {April, 1979.}It consists of a very small habitation which was included in the original{Domesday Book}as {Gladstone.}The road is left not made up and the buildings reflect varying periods of history. Even the post box is Victorian. The old farm house now used as a private house stands, in {Gayton Farm Road}with its date of building,{1761,}clearly visible over the door and its Victorian knot garden to the side.
